Author: Cup_and_Saucer
Text: Also 5' and boy ain't this a mood. Sometimes I'll feel really proud when I look at the number on the scale after a big loss until I see someone 6 inches taller with the same number. I obviously don't know what it's like to lose weight as a taller person but I stg it's twice as hard as a fucking Hobbit like me ðŸ˜­

Author: shsldepression2
Text: Dude same!!! My height is already considered above average for my age and gender, but I still feel fat, so whenever I see someone taller than me and the same weight as me/lighter than me I die inside. ESPECIALLY if it's a guy.   I just admitted of being jealous of one of my friends.
